text: Compared to Zerodha Kite, the Groww chart zooming experience is not very responsive while analyzing candlestick charts with multiple indicators. The main issue is that when I try to stretch the chart vertically, the chart also stretches horizontally automatically, which should not happen. The same problem occurs in reverse horizontal stretching also affects vertical scaling, making it difficult to analyze the chart properly.

Groww is a very simple and easy-to-use app for investing. Opening the account, buying stocks, and starting SIPs is smooth. The interface is clean and beginner-friendly. But customer support needs improvement, and advanced charting tools are limited for traders. Still, for long-term investors and mutual fund SIPs, Groww is a good and reliable option.
